name: Bajaj Finserv Ltd.
benefits: Get a welcome e-gift voucher worth ₹500 from Amazon.
Earn 10X rewards on online spends with exclusive partners.
E-voucher worth ₹8,00,000 on annual online spends of ₹2 Lakhs.
Spends ₹1 Lakh and get annual fee of ₹499 reversed for your SimplyCLICK SBI card in the subsequent year.
